===Etymology 1===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=にっぽんぎんこう|日本|tr1=Nippon|t1=Japan|銀行|tr2=ginkō|t2=bank}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

The ''Nippon'' reading for {{ja-l|日本}} here is part of the official name of the bank.

* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}
* {{ja-accent-common|n|に|っぽんぎ|んこう}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[nipːõ̞ŋ ɡĩŋko̞ː]}}

====Proper noun====
{{ja-pos|proper|にっぽん ぎんこう|hhira=にっぽんぎんかう}}

# the [[w:Bank of Japan|Bank of Japan]]
#: Often abbreviated in English as {{m|en|BOJ}}.
